11121112.content:
Ino held onto Eric, who was struggling to break free from her grip, as Ten Ten held onto Jabari, who couldn't do much at the time. As Eric tried to escape, Ino just giggled childishly, in spite that she had him and wasn't going to let him go.

"Why fight it, your not going anywhere, Eric." said Ino.

"What do you want with us?" asked Eric stil struggling to break free.

Ino had a serious face and placed him onto the table. Ten Ten followed Ino's actions and reunited Jabari with Eric. Ino then explained why she and Ten Ten wanted them in their world.

"You see, we know that you have been shrunken before by other girls and we thought 'hey, lets shrink this Eric and Jabari and keep them for ourselves'." explained Ino.

Eric and Jabari were astounded, they thought that they were in the clear from anyone knowing that they have been shrunken before, but apparently, they were found out.

"Ya, but that still doesn't explain why you want us here." said Jabari.

Ten Ten wagged her finger and said, "Because silly, you two are just so god damn cute, that we had to have you for our own selfish pleasures."

Eric looked happy to see that at least there was one girl that was humble enough to admit that she and Ino had them for pleasurable reasons.

"Well, enough chit-chat, its time for you boys to go to work." said Ino taking off her shoes.

Ten Ten sat on the sofa next to Ino and also took off her shoes. The two girls placed the boys on the floor and placed their feet next to them.

"We want you to rub our feet, all this ninja training is getting to be a burden on our bodies, so what better position for you to have than to massage our beautiful, sweaty feet." explained Ten Ten.

Ino and Ten Ten smiled while letting their feet swing back and forth as they awaited the answer(as if they need it) of the two shrunken boys.

"Dude, what should we do?" asked Jabari.

Eric looked disturbed, "What the hell can we do, I don't think we have much choice at the position we are in."

"Soo, what's it going to be boys?" asked Ino.

Eric struggled to get the words out due to his stubborness, "Alright, we'll do it, but not from our own free will."

"Good answer." said the girls as they placed the soles of their feet in front of the boys.

Eric moved to Ino's foot and Jabari to Ten Ten's foot and placed their hands on the bottom of the sole. The feeling of the their feet were moist and soggy and the stench was horrific, but had to be done. Eric and Jabari started to rub up and down to releave the tension in the muscles in their foot.

"Mmmm, thats it." said Ino putting her head back with relaxation.

"Thats right, keep going." said Ten Ten sleepily, resting her head on the pillow.

Eric and Jabari were starting to sweat at the vigorous activity, but this was only the pinicle of it all. Ino and Ten Ten placed their foot on the ground so that they could get working on their toes as well.

"YOU'VE GOT TO BE KIDDING ME!!" yelled Jabari.

Eric was amazed at the rage that Jabari had within him all along, this was probably the first time that he has seen him in this mood.

Ten Ten looked down at him and said, "Hey, no complaining, you and Eric agreed that you would both loosen us up, and if you have anything to say about it, well, lets just say you don't."

Jabari gulped as he recollected on his outburst and apologized. Eric and Jabari both started to pound away at the toes, both to vent their anger and to get this job done. After a couple of minutes, Jabari and Eric both finished with their feets, both exhausted.

Ino and Ten Ten got up, picked them both up, Ino saiying, "Well done boys, I think that we should do something different now."

"Oh, on the contrary, maybe they should finish up our entire bodies, I'm still pretty sore from my last mission." said Ten Ten.
